subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Geoff Ogilvy won the WGC-CA Championship Monday after a rain delay by posting nine consecutive pars to finish at 17-under and edge Tiger Woods, Retief Goosen, Jim Furyk and Vijay Singh.
snippet: Geoff Ogilvy won the WGC-CA Championship Monday after a rain delay by posting nine consecutive pars to finish at 17-under and edge Tiger Woods, Retief Goosen, Jim Furyk and Vijay Singh.
